title: Meeting Interaction
description: Captures information in the context of a meeting between people online or at a specified location

isAllDay.title: All Day meeting/event
isAllDay.description: A flag to represent whether the meeting is all day long

isOnline.title: Meeting online/offline
isOnline.description: A flag indicating whether the neeting is online of offline

isReminderSet.title: Reminder Set for the meeting
isReminderSet.description: A flag indicating whether a reminder has been in place for the meeting

reminderDateTime.title: Date and time at which the reminder is set
reminderDateTime.description: The date and time for which the reminder is set, if the flag for reminder set has been set to true

scheduledStartDateTime.title: Time at which the meeting has been schedued to start
scheduledStartDateTime.description: Scheduled time at which the meeting will start

scheduledEndDateTime.title: Scheduled time for the meeting to end
scheduledEndDateTime.description: Scheduled time by which the meeting should end

organizerID.title: Person organizing the meeting
organizerID.description: Person who is responsible to control and manage the meeting
